Row.Text: Allows all players to accumulate Great General and Great Admiral points from fighting Barbarians.
Barbarian spawn rates reduced slightly. Groovy, man.
AI leaders will not resent other players for their progress towards Victory Conditions. This makes the game significantly easier.
AI leaders will not receive an aggression boost towards players who are getting close to winning the game. NOTE: This option is redundant if 'Disable AI Victory Competition' is enabled.
One random Victory Type (Culture, Diplomatic, or Science) is enabled when any player enters the Atomic Era. All other victories are disabled (note: Time and Domination Victories are always possible).
Display raw numbers next to diplomatic modifiers. In addition, AI leaders will never hide negative modifiers.

In Game Setup, do not show the leader/civ details of other human players on other teams (if they are not choosing Random Leader).[NEWLINE]When loading a savegame, do not show the leader/civ details for players on other teams that you have not met in-game.
Research Agreements cannot be signed with other civilizations.
Civilizations may not sell a Technology unless they have researched it themselves.
Enable bad outcome events from Vox Populi's Player and City Events System.
Enable Civilization-specific events from Vox Populi's Player and City Events System.
Enable positive outcome events from Vox Populi's Player and City Events System.
Enable neutral outcome events from Vox Populi's Player and City Events System.
Enable trade (miscellaneous) outcome events from Vox Populi's Player and City Events System.
